Detailed Description

Describes the meta data for an installed AppWidget provider.

The fields in this class correspond to the fields in the <appwidget-provider> xml tag.

 // Using AppWidgetManager to get all installed AppWidgetProviderInfo list.
 AppWidgetManaget* mpManager = new AppWidgetManager(this);
 Vector<AppWidgetProviderInfo*> instanllObject;
 instanllObject = mpManager->getInstalledProvidersN(AppWidgetProviderInfo::PROVIDER_TYPE_HOME);

 // Using AppWidgetProviderInfo to get meta data with corresponding AppWidgetProvider.
 AppWidgetProviderInfo* info = instanllObject.itemAt(0);

 // To get provider name.
 ComponentName provider = info->getProvider();
 // To get the default width of the widget when added to a host.

 int32_t minWidth = info->getMinWidth();
 // To get the default height of the widget when added to a host.
 int32_t minHeight = info->getMinHeight();
 // To get the minimum width which the widget can be resized to.
 int32_t minResizeWidget = info->getMinResizeWidth();
 // To get the minimum height which the widget can be resized to.
 int32_t minResizeHeight = info->getMinResizeHeight();
 // To get the maximum height which the widget can be resized to.
 int32_t maxResizeHeight = info->getMaxResizeWidth();
 // To get the maximum height which the widget can be resized to.
 int32_t maxResizeHeight = info->getMaxResizeHeight();

 // To get the resource id of the initial layout for this AppWidget.
 int32_t initalLayout = info->getInitialLayout();
 // To get the page to launch that will configure the AppWidget.
 ComponentName* configure = info->getConfigureN();
 // To get the label to display to the user in the AppWidget picker.
 String label = info->getLabel();
 // To get the resource id of an icon to display for this AppWidget in the AppWidget picker.
 int32_t icon = info->getIcon();
 // To get the resource id of a preview image.
 int32_t previewImage = info->getPreviewImage();

 // To get the rules by which a widget can be resized.
 int32_t resizeMode = info->getResizeMode();
 // To get the period of this AppWidget wants to be updated.
 int32_t updatePeriodMillis = info->getUpdatePeriodMillis();
 // To get the AppWidgetProvider category: PROVIDER_TYPE_HOME or PROVIDER_TYPE_BANNER.
 int32_t providerType = info->getProviderType();
 // To get the AppWidgetProvider resize style: RESIZE_STYLE_CONTENT_FIXED or RESIZE_STYLE_CONTENT_SCALE.
 int32_t resizeStyle = info->getResizeStyle();
 // To get the title resource id of the AppWidgetProvider to display in the AppWidget picker.
 int32_t titleId = info->getTitleId();

 // To get the width resized threshold vector.
 Vector<int32_t> widthVector = info->getResizeWidthVector();
 // To get the height resized threshold vector.
 Vector<int32_t> heightVector = info->getResizeHeightVector();

You could refer to the development page for AppWidget details: COS Cplusplus Development/Developer Guides/AppWidget

Definition at line 80 of file AppWidgetProviderInfo.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

Widget resize mode enumeration.

Enumerator:
RESIZE_NONE 

The widget is not resizable.

RESIZE_HORIZONTAL 

The widget is resizable in the horizontal axis only.

RESIZE_VERTICAL 

The widget is resizable in the vertical axis only.

RESIZE_BOTH 

The widget is resizable in both the horizontal and vertical axes.

Definition at line 85 of file AppWidgetProviderInfo.h.

anonymous enum

Widget category enumeration.

Enumerator:
PROVIDER_TYPE_HOME 

The widget belong to Home.

PROVIDER_TYPE_BANNER 

The widget belong to Notification page banner.

Definition at line 110 of file AppWidgetProviderInfo.h.

anonymous enum

Widget resize style enumeration.

Enumerator:
RESIZE_STYLE_CONTENT_FIXED 

Content will fixed when AppWidgetHostWidget resize.

RESIZE_STYLE_CONTENT_SCALE 

Content will scale when AppWidgetHostWidget resize.

core::ComponentName* gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getConfigureN ( ) const

Get the configure of this AppWidgetProvider.

The activity to launch that will configure the AppWidget.

Returns:
The configure component name.
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getIcon ( ) const

Get the icon resource id of the AppWidgetProvider.

The icon to display for this AppWidget in the AppWidget picker. If not supplied in the xml, the application icon will be used.

Returns:
The icon resource id.
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getInitialLayout ( ) const

Get the resource id of the initial layout for this AppWidget.

This should be displayed until the RemoteWidget for the AppWidget is available.

Returns:
The resource id of the initial layout.

If not supplied in the xml, the application label will be used.

int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getMaxResizeHeight ( ) const

Get the maximum height(in px) which the AppWidgetProvider can be resized to.

This field has no effect resizing isn't enabled.

Returns:
The AppWidgetProvider maximum resized height.
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getMaxResizeWidth ( ) const

Get the maximum width(in px) which the AppWidgetProvider can be resized to.

This field has no effect if resizing isn't enabled.

Returns:
The AppWidgetProvider maximum resized width.

int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getMinResizeHeight ( ) const

Get the minimum height(in px) which the AppWidgetProvider can be resized to.

This field has no effect if it is greater than minheight or if horizontal resizing isn't enabled.

Returns:
The AppWidgetProvider minimum resized height.
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getMinResizeWidth ( ) const

Get the minimum width(in px) which the AppWidgetProvider can be resized to.

This field has no effect if it is greater than minWidth or if horizontal resizing isn't enabled.

Returns:
The AppWidgetProvider minimum resized width.

int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getPreviewImage ( ) const

Get the preview image resource id of the AppWidgetProvider.

A preview of what the AppWidget will look like after it's configured. If not supplied, the AppWidget's icon will be used.

Returns:
The preview image resource id.
core::ComponentName gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getProvider ( ) const

int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getProviderType ( ) const

Get the AppWidgetProvider category.

Get the widget category belong to. See PROVIDER_TYPE_HOME, PROVIDER_TYPE_BANNER.

Returns:
The category of widget.
base::Vector<int32_t> gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getResizeHeightVector ( ) const

Get the height resized threshold vector.

Returns:
The AppWidgetProvider height resized threshold vector(in px).
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getResizeMode ( ) const

Get the AppWidgetProvider resize mode.

The rules by which a widget can be resized. See RESIZE_NONE, RESIZE_NONE, RESIZE_HORIZONTAL, RESIZE_VERTICAL, RESIZE_BOTH.

Returns:
The resize mode.
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getResizeStyle ( ) const

Get the AppWidgetProvider resize style.

Get the resize style belong to. See RESIZE_STYLE_CONTENT_FIXED, RESIZE_STYLE_CONTENT_SCALE.

Returns:
The resize style of widget.
base::Vector<int32_t> gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getResizeWidthVector ( ) const

Get the width resized threshold vector.

Returns:
The AppWidgetProvider width resized threshold vector(in px).
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getTitleId ( ) const

Get the title resource id of the AppWidgetProvider.

The title to display for this AppWidget in the AppWidget picker. If not supplied in the xml, the provider class name will be used.

Returns:
The title resource id.
int32_t gaia::core::AppWidgetProviderInfo::getUpdatePeriodMillis ( ) const

How often, in milliseconds, that this AppWidget wants to be updated.

The AppWidget manager may place a limit on how often a AppWidget is updated.

This field corresponds to the android:updatePeriodMillis attribute in the AppWidget meta-data file.

Updates requested with updatePeriodMillis will not be delivered more than once every 30 minutes.
